Read full topic
item.source: How do add a skilling place

item.title: How do add a skilling place
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’ll do a basic outline, bare in mind I have no idea what you’re looking for.


// start of skilling area
//commands 
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("skillingarena") {
toX = XCORD;
toY = YCORD;
sM("You teleport to the skilling arena);
}

first click ovject packet/second click.

//objects if (objectID == IDUWANT) { // possible others toX = XCORD; toY = YCORD; sM("You teleport to the Skilling Arena"); }

Now to make the arena, first make the globalobjects you want (common sense) then we need to make the objects work, if they don’t already.

//again object click packet

if (objectID ==IDforTree) {
addItem(ID, Amount);
sM("You cut a tree, and get a log!");
}
if (objectID ==IDforRocks) {
addItem(ID, Amount);
sM("You mine some rocks and get some ore!");
}
if (objectID ==IDforTree) {
addItem(ID, Amount);
sM("You cut a tree, and get a log!");
}
if (objectID ==IDforAnythingElse) {
addItem(ID, Amount);
sM("Your message");
}

Just a heads up they don’t have timers or anything, it’ll be a crappy arena.Took me like 10 minutes to write it up with text. It’s just a basic outline. Note again variables may be different, and your objects may already work if your source is prety much pre-made for you to edit.

Read full topic
item.source: How do add a skilling place

item.title: How do add a skilling place
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

You’re asking for about 20 different codes.
You need a tele code to where your skilling place is.
You need to add globalobjects to certain coords where your skilling place is
You need to add shops if you want in certain coords where your skilling place is
You need to add items to those shops if you want them
So basically you need a coder ^-^

Good luck.

BTW To add globalobjects, check client.java
To add shops, check autospawn.cfg
To add items to shops, check shops.cfg
I’m not so sure about tele commands, thats my weak point :s

Read full topic
item.source: How do add a skilling place
